pkgmetadata.longdescription: Port of the 'Scilab' 'n1qn1' Module for Unconstrained BFGS Optimization // Provides 'Scilab' 'n1qn1', or Quasi-Newton BFGS "qn" without constraints. This takes more memory than traditional L-BFGS. This routine is useful since it allows prespecification of a Hessian. If the Hessian is near enough the truth in optimization it can speed up the optimization problem. The algorithm is described in the 'Scilab' optimization documentation located at http://www.scilab.org/con tent/download/250/1714/file/optimization_in_scilab.pdf.
